commands.description: Prints the combat log of a player to the console.
Toggles the out-of-bounds killbox underneath the map. Use '0' to disable and '1' to enable the check.
Toggles global chat. When enabled, global chat messages are seen by all players on the server. Use '0' to disable and '1' to enable.
Toggles god mode (invincibility) for the player who entered the command. Use '0' to disable and '1' to enable god mode.
Displays the current number of sleeping players on the server.
Toggles logging of when Notes are renamed. Use '0' to disable and '1' to enable the logging.
Defines how long destroyed boats persist (in seconds) before being despawned. 'int' is a whole number representing seconds.
Defines the maximum amount of players that a team can have. 'int' is a whole number representing the team size limit.
Sends the target player to a sleeping state.
